text: God takaw ne ak kɨm mɨdeb, kɨles yɨbɨl gɨlɨg mɨdeb. Baynat pɨspɨs kɨd yɨbɨl gak tek ak mɨdeb ak pen, baynat pɨspɨs kɨd sɨkol, takaw anɨb ak pɨspɨs kɨd tɨmel yɨbɨl. Takaw anɨb ak binɨb kɨlop puŋɨlɨl, nab okyaŋ amub. Nab ayaŋ amɨl, kawnan sek bipɨl ayaŋ sek nab ak amub. Pen abe amɨl, tɨŋɨl sek sɨlom sek jɨmñɨl mɨdeb nab ayaŋ amub. Anɨb ak tek, binɨb gos tɨmud ak sek gos nab ayaŋ sek mɨdupsek nɨgtep gɨl, kɨlop tɨg asɨkup.
